hymn.title: Thine be the glory, risen, conqu'ring Son

layout.singingstanza: Thine be the glo -- ry, ris -- en, con -- qu'ring Son, End -- less is the vic -- t'ry Thou o'er death hast won; An -- gels in bright rai -- ment rolled the stone a -- way, Kept the fold -- ed grave- -- clothes, where Thy bo -- dy lay. Thine be the glo -- ry, ris -- en, con -- qu'ring Son, End -- less is the vic -- t'ry Thou o'er death hast won.

lyrics.stanza: Thine be the glory, risen, conqu'ring Son, Endless is the vict'ry Thou o'er death hast won; Angels in bright raiment rolled the stone away, Kept the folded grave-clothes, where Thy body lay.
Thine be the glory, risen, conqu'ring Son, Endless is the vict'ry Thou o'er death hast won.
